thread.title: Its good to not be fully aware of how tough the startup journey can be
thread.title_full: Its good to not be fully aware of how tough the startup journey can be

title: Its good to not be fully aware of how tough the startup journey can be
text:
"It's good to not be fully aware of how tough the startup journey can be" 
Times Of India Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
When they tried to conivince big retail chains that they could help them manage their gift card programme, no one was excited. "We were asking them to repose their faith and trust in us rather than their own in-house server. If we had known the complexity that was involved in this, we wouldn't have ventured into this field," Pratap says, partly in jest, adding, "Sometimes it's good to be not entirely aware of how tough the journey can be."...
